lines.text: Well, I think Grace looks great. I think she looks terrific just the way she is
You know what you said about liking the way I look? Did you just say that?
Those guys are a bunch of yoyo's they really are. Well sometimes I feel like I gotta be a part of it. Ya know um to be a real man, and then when I'm there I'm mostly embarrassed. Grace!
Just let go! Let's say it! I'm obesely overweight, I'm Fat, and I'm disgusting!
Would you stop it! Stop saying that junk! Just listen to me I was, I was a real jerk back there ok, That is not the way I really feel. And I'm sorry. And I like you Grace. I like you a lot.
That's because you had something to think about.
Yea, something nice. Christmas Eve and you.
It's all my fault, I told you stuff and now you feel sorry for me. I don't want that!
